resources.string: Tap the start button to connect the socket and transmit audio data. This would happen secretly in the nefarious application.
Click here to practice verbal communication. Your device will record you as you speak the provided text. You can then compare with the correct rendition, and rate your recording.
Click this option to practice writing. The app will provide certain texts or practice material. You should then write the provided texts. Each practice text is especially picked for you.
This option is to demo the ML functionality of this project. Use it to send the audio recording to the base server where it can be categorized.
